sections.heading: Departments; officers; bond or insurance required
sections.text: Each head of a department shall be bonded or insured as required by section 11-201, which bond or policy shall be filed in the office of the Secretary of State.SourceLaws 1919, c. 190, ยง 10, p. 438;C.S.1922, ยง 7251;C.S.1929, ยง 81-113;R.S.1943, ยง 81-1
